original_title: Rabbit Ears - Parables That Jesus Told
overview: Here the parables of The Sower, The Good Samaritan and The Prodigal Son come to life against the backdrop of Jesus journeys through Galilee and Judea. The parables are put into a context that makes their simple truths resonate with meaning for young audiences.
title: Rabbit Ears - Parables That Jesus Told
